name: The Last Cup Of Coffee
description:
Here is my entry for the Game jam Ludum Dare 39 with the theme "Running out of power".

The game is about an office employee who fight against his colleague for the last cup of coffee (The modern age power for humankind).

EDIT:  the post compo bugfix reduce the mouse sensitivity and reduce the number of physic bodies emulated for performance (computers and chair won't move anymore).

Thank you for playing.
